data.title: Did Warren Beatty cheat on Annette Benning?
data.meta_description: I never heard any stories.  He was such a pussy hound I can’t believe he remained monogamous
data.text:
He certainly changed his ways abruptly when he took up with her. I always thought it was because he sensed a cultural shift with the AIDS crisis, that the great lothario image was not gonna work for him anymore. Also, maybe he actually did want a family at that point.

[quote]He was such a pussy hound I can’t believe he remained monogamous

I can't believe she would expect him to be monogamous.

What’s up with these WB threads all of a sudden?

Is a divorce about to be announced or what?

Sounds like it…

R8, wasn’t Halle before Annette?

I love AB. I just rewatched American Beauty the other day, and she was so fantastic.

Love the scene where Spacey’s taking her and Peter Gallagher’s burgers order.

Such a great film!
